definition: first of three 10 day periods of hot season
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: Scarlet dropped her head on her arms and struggled not to cry.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉將頭伏在臂膀上，竭力忍住了哭。

sentences.english: He laid his head on his arms and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 他頭伏在自己手臂上就睡着了。
